name: Learning the Ropes
description:
Learning the Ropes is a mechanical prototype origin story for Basher and Penny, 2 cubes who are lost both in space and in love. 

The game is a proof of concept from a game jam of a co-op 2-person story game where the objective is for both characters to team up and  use their unique abilities in order to overcome obstacles and make it to the end of each level. 

While the game was designed for 2 players, it is definitely possible to complete it solo. 

INSTRUCTIONS
---------------------

CONTROLS: 

                                                 MOVEMENT            SPECIAL ACTION  

BASHER (RED)

JUMP                                             W

L+R                                                A | D                                         SPACE

PENNY (BLUE)

JUMP                                  UP ARROW

L+R               LEFT ARROW | RIGHT ARROW        RIGHT CTRL

Conversation needs to be skipped by pressing the continue button in the bottom right corner of the dialogue window with the Left Mouse Button.
